content: CID Stand-off extensions Pre- or post-poured firestop cast-in accessory for water containment and riser clamp support for vertical pipe penetrations ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection ### FEATURES:Features Quick and simple installation â€“ designed to increase your productivity and reduce labor costs Designed to meet requirements for a minimum 2 stand-off above substrate surface Applications Designed to meet requirements for a minimum 2 stand-off above substrate surface Once installed, the completed application can provide an effective solution for fire protection, water containment and riser clamp support for vertical pipe penetrations Support of vertical metal and plastic pipe clamps ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2088750 - Stand-off Extension 2 - Package Size 10 pc - 2088751 - Stand-off Extension 3 - Package Size 10 pc - 2088752 - Stand-off Extension 4 - Package Size 6 pc - 2088753 - Stand-off Extension 6 - Package Size 1 pc - 3519883 - CP 680 P/M 4 Standoff post install kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 6x Stand-off Extension 4 - 3519881 - CP 680 P/M 2 Standoff post install kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 10x Stand-off Extension 2 - 3519882 - CP 680 P/M 3 Standoff post install kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 10x Stand-off Extension 3 - 3578894 - CP 680 M 2 Standoff Kit Complete - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 30x Coupling CP 680-P/M 2 CPL WT - 30x Cast-in device CP 680-M 2 - 30x Stand-off Extension 2 - 3578642 - CP 680 P 2 Standoff Kit Complete - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 30x Coupling CP 680-P/M 2 CPL WT - 30x Cast-in device CP 680-P 2 - 30x Stand-off Extension 2 - 3578893 - CP 680 P 4 Standoff Kit Complete - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x Coupling CP 680-P/M 4 CPL WT - 18x Cast-in device CP 680-P 4 - 18x Stand-off Extension 4
